column2: Glory to the Angel of Death!
Glory to the New World Order!
May the Invisible Hand guide you

The Plaguebringers worship what traditional believers would call evil spirits, as they curse their enemies with disease and turn to dark figures like Unk Cekula to achieve their personal goals. Most unsettling are the rumors that they carry very little qualms in regards to how this dark favor is gained...
column3: Les Porteurs de la Peste adorent ce que les croyants traditionnels appelleraient les esprits malfaisants, car ils maudissent leurs ennemis avec la maladie et se tournent vers Erlik, le Dieu de la mort, pour atteindre leurs objectifs personnels. Le plus dérangeant est la rumeur selon laquelle ils ont très peu de scrupules sur la manière d'obtenir cette obscure faveur...
column4: Die Seuchenbringer verehren, was traditionelle Gläubige als böse Geister bezeichnen würden. Sie belegen ihre Feinde mit Flüchen und Krankheiten und wenden sich an Erlik, den Gott des Todes, um ihre persönlichen Ziele zu erreichen. Besonders verstörend sind Gerüchte, wonach sie so ziemlich alles tun würden, um seine dunkle Gunst zu erlangen ...
column6: Los pandemonios veneran a lo que los creyentes tradicionales denominan "espíritus malignos". Maldicen a sus enemigos con enfermedades e imploran a Erlik, el dios de la muerte, que les ayude a conseguir metas personales. Circulan rumores inquietantes acerca de su falta de escrúpulos a la hora de conseguir el favor de su oscura divinidad.

column2: The Black Akiçita of the Plaguebringers.
column3: Le Khan Noir des Porteurs de la Peste.
column6: El khanum negro de los pandemonios.

column2: The ultimate cause of the Event which destroyed Old America is shrouded in mystery. However, there is one theory that has persisted through the ages. It claims that a secret society used supernatural powers to bring down Old America for their own evil ends. Some say this society still exists today, and that they are looking for new members...
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a member of the Illuminati.
Has not been approached by the Illuminati before.
column3: N'a pas déjà été approché par le Illuminati.
column4: Wurde noch nicht von den Illuminati angesprochen.
column6: Nunca ha tenido contacto con el Illuminati.

column2: The Grand Master of the Illuminati.

The Society of Jesus, also known as the Jesuits, have had a presence in the Americas for over a millenium. They have once again dedicated themselves to bringing the word of God to North America, no matter the cost...\nAs a lay member of the Order, you are expected not to pursue material wealth and to assist the Jesuits whenever possible.
column3: Les Dominicains sont capables d'écouter les confessions de n'importe quel chrétien. Habillés en noir et blanc, ils mènent la sainte inquisition en identifiant les hérétiques. En tant que membre de cet ordre, il est attendu de vous de ne pas rechercher l'enrichissement matériel, mais la vérité.
column4: Die Mitglieder des Dominikanerordens sind in schwarz und weiß gekleidet und lauschen den Beichten aller Christen. Ihnen obliegt die Führung der Heiligen Inquisition, deren Aufgabe es ist, Ketzer aufzuspüren. Von Angehörigen des Ordens wird verlangt, allen materiellen Gütern abzuschwören und nach wahrer Erkenntnis zu streben.
column6: Los miembros de la orden dominicana pueden confesar a cualquier cristiano. Visten de blanco y negro, están al mando de la santa Inquisición y su misión consiste en desenmascarar a los herejes. Sus miembros deben perseguir la verdad y no acumular bienes materiales.

column2: The Inquisitors are able to listen to the confessions of any [christian.GetGroupName] – dressed in white and black, they lead the holy inquisition, charged with a mission to identify heretics. As a lay member of their Order you are expected to not pursue material wealth, but strive to be a seeker of truth.
column3: Les Inquisiteurs sont capables d'écouter les confessions de n'importe quel [christian.GetGroupName]. Habillés en noir et blanc, ils mènent la sainte inquisition en identifiant les hérétiques. En tant que membre de cet ordre, il est attendu de vous de ne pas rechercher l'enrichissement matériel, mais la vérité.
column4: Die Inquisitoren sind in schwarz und weiß gekleidet und lauschen den Beichten aller [christian.GetGroupName]en Gläubigen. Ihnen obliegt die Führung der Heiligen Inquisition, deren Aufgabe es ist, Ketzer aufzuspüren. Von Angehörigen des Ordens wird verlangt, allen materiellen Gütern abzuschwören und nach wahrer Erkenntnis zu streben.
column6: Los Inquisidores pueden confesar a cualquier [christian.GetGroupName]. Visten de blanco y negro, están al mando de la Santa Inquisición y su misión consiste en desenmascarar a los herejes. Sus miembros deben perseguir la verdad y no acumular bienes materiales.

column2: The Conversus of the Benedictine Order.
column3: Le Conversus de l'Ordre des Bénédictins.
column6: El conversus de la orden de san Benito.

column2: The Praepositus Generalis of the Benedictine Order.
column3: Le Conversus de l'Ordre des Bénédictins.
column6: El conversus de la orden de san Benito.

column2: The Chabad movement originated in the Old World, but its leaders have resided in Brooklyn for centuries. The movement emphasizes the importance of wisdom, understanding, and knowledge, focusing on Torah study and prayer rather than esotericism.
The Studious Ones is an old scholar community with "Pray and Study", as their motto. They worship [jewish.GetHighGodName] and find purpose in scholarly work and debate.
The Rebbe of the Chabad movement.
This character has secluded themselves to acknowledge and repent for their sins, so that they will be less likely to sin in future.
Your character will make more of an effort to fulfill the first mitzvah — to be fruitful and multiply.
Invite a Chabad rabbi to join your court.
A Chabad Rabbi will soon appear at the court of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
Enables you to invite a learned Chasidic Rabbi to your court.
Send shluchim from [From.Society.GetName] to the local population so that they may encourage them to adopt a more traditional culture.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! the title shield of a county to convert the local population to Yiddish culture, if the county is already Jewish.

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The hectic life of a ruler rarely allows for sufficient time for repentance. I ask of you to seclude yourself and think about the sins you have committed. Reflection is the first step to repentance, [Root.GetSocietyRank].

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To become a better Jew, you are to seclude yourself to reflct and repent. Spend your days reading [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] and contemplating your sins, both past and present. During this time, you must live simply and restrict your access to the outside world.
To complete this mission, select §Y'Begin Secluded Teshuva'§! in the Intrigue Menu and successfully complete your process of redemption.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can seclude [Root.GetHerselfHimself] and reflect upon [Root.GetHerHis] life and [Root.GetHerHis] sins to become a better Jew.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not secluded [Root.GetHerselfHimself] to perform teshuva recently.\n
This character simply cannot help but act shamefully. Even as they attempted to perform teshuva, they fell to sin.
This county is in a state of unrest due to Chabad's efforts to make the local populace adopt Yiddish culture.
The Chabad Rabbi has finally arrived at my court. [From.GetFirstName] is a most noble and wise rabbi and I will happily receive [From.GetHerHis] counsel in matters of religion and scholarly pursuits.
A majority of the population in [From.GetName] has embraced Yiddish culture.

A courier is brought before me with a message, telling me that [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has sent shluchim to [From.GetName] who have successfully managed to persuade the populace to embrace Yiddish culture.
Start planning the theft of the §Ancient Torah§!!
Fascinating! I shall visit the synagogue where this feat has been accomplished.

column1: ##Note: the Benedictine order is well-established as an Anglican religious order IRL. I don't think I have to touch most of their localization.##

column2: The Diligent Ones is an old monastic community with 'Ora et Labora', meaning 'pray and labor', as their motto. Often recognized by their black habits, they worship [high_church.GetHighGodName] and find purpose in prayer and quiet contemplation as well as scholarly work.
column3: Les Diligents sont une vieille communauté monastique, dont 'Ora et Labora', 'Prie et travaille', est la devise. Souvent reconnus par leurs habits noirs, ils rendent un culte au [catholic.GetHighGodName] et se consacrent à la prière et la contemplation silencieuse, aussi bien qu'aux travaux d'érudition.
column4: Der Gewissenhaften sind eine alte Mönchsgemeinschaft, die dem Motto "Ora et Labora" ("Bete und arbeite") folgt. Man erkennt die Mitglieder oft an ihren schwarzen Kutten. Sie beten zu [catholic.GetHighGodName] und machen sich das Gebet, die stille Meditation sowie gelehrsame Arbeit zum Lebenszweck.
column6: Los Diligentes son una antigua comunidad monástica cuyo lema es "Ora et labora"(reza y trabaja). Se les reconoce por sus hábitos negros. Adoran a Dios y encuentran un propósito en la oración, la contemplación silenciosa y la labor académica.

column2: The Brigham Young Society grew out of the old Brigham Young University after the Event. The Brigham Young Society is now exclusively Mormon, and focused more on the Mormon faith more than secular education.

The Pious Following follows the oldest of monastic rules, set originally by the hallowed martyr. In the spirit of the deserts we value simplicity, submission and humility. It is the duty of [miaphysite.GetName] monks to work to spread the word, building on the oldest [christian.GetName] monastic tradition in the world.
column3: Les Pieux Adeptes suivent les plus anciennes règles monastiques, établies à l'origine par le martyr sanctifié. Ce qu'ils apprécient dans les esprits du désert, c'est la simplicité, la soumission et l'humilité. Il est du devoir des moines [miaphysite.GetName]s d'oeuvrer à répandre la sainte parole, en s'appuyant sur la plus ancienne tradition monastique [christian.GetName] du monde.
column4: Die frommen Anhänger folgen den ältesten Mönchsregeln, die auf den Heiligen Märtyrer zurückgehen. Im Geiste der großen Väter der ägyptischen Wüste legen wir Wert auf Schlichtheit, Gehorsam und Demut. Es ist die Pflicht der [miaphysite.GetName]en Mönche, das Wort zu verbreiten und die älteste [christian.GetName]e Mönchstradition weiterzuführen.
column6: Los Seguidores píos siguen las reglas monásticas más antiguas, establecidas por el santo mártir. En consonancia con su espíritu valoramos la sencillez, la sumisión y la humildad. El deber de los monjes [miaphysite.GetName] es trabajar para difundir la palabra, basándose en la tradición monástica [christian.GetName] más antigua del mundo.

column2: The Chancellor of the Brigham Young University.

The Bankers' Guild has existed for centuries. Originally a small organization that existed simply to train and organize private bankers, it has since grown into a continent-wide association that enforces debts and regulates investment. Although many religions look down on moneylending, it can be incredibly profitable if you have good intuition...
The Chief Officer of the Bankers' Guild.
Sell your shares on the market in exchange for cold, hard cash.
Use your shares to subsidize construction in your realm for half a year.
Use your shares to massively invest in research, giving you tech points almost instantly.
Increase the prosperity level of this area, in exchange for a significant number of shares.
This character has recently sold some of their shares.
This character has subsidized construction in their realm.
This character has recently made a massive investment to research in their realm.
This character has recently increased prosperity in their realm.
You have successfully sold your shares at market.
It was a good time to cash out.
You have decided to invest in research in your realm, but you must still decide where exactly your investment will go.
I will invest in economic research, of course.
I will give patronage to prominent authors and artists in my realm.
We must not fall behind in military technology!
You have successfully increased the prosperity level of a county in your realm.

You may be a banker, but you are also a ruler, and you have recently allowed your duties as a banker to languish. The Chief Officer has therefore asked you to put more of a focus on matters of business and finance.
To complete this mission, pick the §Y'Business'§! focus in the Character screen.

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We have noticed that you are not putting an appropriate focus on matters of business and finance. You should rectify this immediately, for the good of both your personal transactions and the Guild as a whole. 

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

You have been putting more focus on matters of business and finance recently, and it certainly shows. Your standing in our Guild has improved, and I am personally impressed with your dedication to our society. 

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]
Good! Now, where is my abacus...

Several of the Guild's clients have failed to pay back their debts, which puts the entire society in jeopardy. The Chief Officer has asked you to collect one of these outstanding debts, using force if necessary.
To complete this mission, win a war using the §Y'Debt War'§! causus belli. Failure to win will have major consequences...

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Many of our clients have recently failed to pay back the debts they owe to the Guild. As you know, failure to enforce debts could lead to the collapse of the entire Guild. We would appreciate it greatly if you... enforced one of these debts.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We have recently received word that you have successfully enforced an outstanding debt. Confidence in our Guild has been restored, and we can now return to business as usual. Your standing in our Guild has increased greatly.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]
I might've had to break a few kneecaps, but it was worth it...

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We have recently received word that you failed to enforce an outstanding debt, and that you furthermore were forced at the point of a sword to forgive that debt. This failure has been noted by the Guild.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]
I was made an offer that I couldn't refuse...
The Chief Officer has requested that you build a city somewhere in your realm. This would be of great benefit to the Guild, and doing this would greatly increase your standing in it.
To complete this mission, build a §Y'City'§! holding somewhere in your realm.

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It has come to the Guild's attention that you own large tracts of empty, unused land. If you were to build a new city somewhere in your realm, your standing in the Guild would increase greatly.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We have received word that a new city has been built in your realm. We have already sent minor guild members there to oversee banking and trade in the area, and the Guild has benefited greatly from this development. As promised, your standing in the Guild has been increased.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]

Hello, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We have received your entry fee in full. Welcome to the Bankers' Guild! Your financial acumen will be put to good use in our society, and I personally look forward to a mutually beneficial partnership.=.

Signed, Chief Officer [From.GetFirstName]
So I just have to sign here and here and...
In recent days, your duties as a banker have kept you from sleeping and eating properly. You feel more and more worn-out...
I think I could use a bank holiday...

Since you have become a banker, you have found yourself becoming less and less sympathetic to the financial perils of others. Surely it is their fault for not pulling themselves up by their boostraps, as you have?
Since you have become a banker, you have found yourself becoming less content with your current lifestyle. A little more gold never hurt anyone, did it?
If I were a rich man...

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you are in violation of this guild's rules. Because of this, you have been summarily expelled from the Bankers' Guild. Please refrain from seeking our services in the future. 

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Il est venu à notre attention que vous n'adhérez plus à la vraie foi. Comme la défense de la religion chiite et de ses adeptes est notre premier devoir, c'est un acte de trahison du plus haut degré. Si vous voulez rester en vie, ne croisez plus notre chemin.

Signé, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],

wir erhielten Kenntnis davon, dass Ihr nun nicht mehr dem wahren Glauben anhängt. Als Verteidiger der Schia und aller wahrhaft Gläubigen ist es unsere höchste Pflicht, diesen Verrat zu sühnen. Sorgt dafür, dass wir uns nie wieder begegnen, wenn Euch Euer Leben lieb ist. 

Gezeichnet, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]:

Ha llegado a nuestro conocimiento que ya no sigues la fe verdadera. Dado que la defensa del chiismo y de sus seguidores es la razón de nuestra existencia y nuestro deber primordial, este constituye el más alto acto de traición. Si deseas conservar la vida, no vuelvas a cruzarte nunca en nuestro camino. 

Firmado: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

column2: Exchange up to one thousand shares for hard currency at a 2 to 1 ratio.
Use your shares to reduce the cost of construction in your realm for a year.
Use your shares to invest in research in your realm, giving you extra tech points.
Use your shares to increase the prosperity level of one of your counties. (Reaper's Due only)
The Emperor's Disciples were founded soon after the birth of Ceticism by Emperor Elton himself as a community dedicated to refining and codifying the principles of the Cetic philosophy.

Members of [cetic.GetName] monasteries are expected to follow a strict set of rules aiming to attain enlightenment through a simple and meditative life. Foreswearing all physical property except the bare necessities.
column3: Les membres des monastères [cetic.GetName]s sont censés suivre un ensemble de règles strictes visant à atteindre l'illumination à travers une vie simple et méditative. Ils renoncent ainsi à tous les biens matériels, hormis le minimum vital.
column4: Von den Mitgliedern [cetic.GetName]er Klöster wird die Einhaltung strenger Regeln erwartet, die durch ein einfaches und meditatives Leben die Erleuchtung ermöglichen sollen. Der Verzicht auf jede Form des physischen Besitzes bedeutet, dass sie nur von dem leben, was ihnen von anderen überlassen wird.
column6: Se espera que los miembros de los monasterios [buddhist.GetName] sigan una estricta serie de normas con la pretensión de alcanzar la iluminación mediante una vida sencilla y de meditación, renegando toda propiedad física, excepto las necesidades básicas.

column2: The Arahnat of the Emperor's Disciples.
You must visit a sacred place to reflect upon Cetic philosophy. This spiritual journey will help you reflect upon yourself and increase your standing with the order.
To complete this mission, activate the decision §Y'Visit a Sacred Place'§! in the Intrigue menu and successfully complete your journey.

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The Order and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] cares much for the souls of our members. As such we would like to advise you to visit a sacred place, since you have not done so before.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetMOGreeting] [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are glad to hear that you have visited a sacred place.
Signed [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

Since the Event, the revitalization of the Confucian School of Learning spread across Asia from China. They believe that the way things once was can be rediscovered by the well-educated and worthy among society. As a member of the Schools of Learning you will seek the truth in the by the rigorous application of ethics and diligent experimentation, and by careful interpretation of ancient texts and symbols.
Record your life's work for posterity in a hard-to-decipher Master Thesis.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not already written a Master Thesis\n
Does NOT already own a Master Thesis on ekpyrotic Cosmogony\n
Does NOT already own a Master Thesis on Big Bang Cosmogony\n
Does NOT already own a Master Thesis on group Psychology\n
Does NOT already own a Master Thesis on individual Psychology\n
Does NOT already own a Master Thesis on chemical Universal Cure-All\n
Does NOT already own a Master Thesis on Atomic Transmutation\n
This character is writing a Master thesis.

Secluded at my writing desk, quill in hand and plenty a bottle of ink nearby, I find myself staring down upon the blank parchment. The sheer scale of the task upon which I am about to embark dawns upon me – I need to record my knowledge, but also use appropriate academic language...

Over the past few months I have developed an elaborate academic vocabulary that I will use to record my life's work. However, before I can continue I must decide upon a direction in which to take my Thesis, as the sum of all my knowledge is simply too great to be recorded in a single book.
Focus my efforts on writing on Cosmogony.
Understanding and union with the Cosmos is what future generations must strive for.\n
Focus my efforts on writing on Psychology.
The intricacies of the subconscious and the Ego will allow your successors to understand their own minds.\n
Focus my efforts on writing on Chemistry.
Through working with basic particles and healing agents your heirs can transform and perfect themselves.\n

I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of Cosmogony, but it is still too vast to touch upon everything. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Cosmogony's aspects.
I will focus on ekpyrotic cosmogony.
An understanding of the cyclical nature of the universe is a necessary first step if one wishes to ultimately comprehend the entire Cosmos.
I will focus on the origins of the Big Bang.
The Big Bang is the seminal event that created the Cosmos, and one cannot achieve true Understanding without understanding how it happened.

I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of the human mind, but it is still too vast to touch upon all that makes up Psychology. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Psychology's aspects.
I will focus on group psychology.
An understanding of how individuals' psyches interact to shape their actions as a group will help your successors understand both the world and themselves.\n
I will focus on the Ego.
The Ego, and the way both the Superego and Id interact to create it, reveal clues about both the minds of all humans as well as the personalities of individuals.\n

I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of reactions and cures, but it is still too vast to touch upon all that makes up Chemistry. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Chemistry's aspects.
I will focus on the mythical Cure-All.
The Cure-All would, as its name implies, cure all diseases and stop the aging process, bringing the natural human body to perfection.
I will focus on atomic transmutation.
Harnessing the power of the Atom to transform metals into gold is a necessary stepping stone towards transforming and perfecting oneself.

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on Ekpyrotic Cosmogony. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
There is nothing new under any of the suns...

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on the Big Bang. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
In the beginning, all matter was condensed into a single point...

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on Group Psychology. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
To understand a group, you must first understand the individual...

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on the Ego. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
The will of all humans is conducted by the Ego.

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on the Cure-All. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
We can defeat cancer, and dementia, and even aging itself.

It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on Atomic Transmutation. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
The Atom is not a mere idol, it is a universal truth!
Constructing your own laboratory will help you in the various experiments needed to delve into the deeper truths of science. It can however easily get very costly...

Every respectable scholar of the Schools of Learning should take on an undergraduate apprentice. Scientific experiments are complex operations which requires extra hands, and what [Root.GetTitle] has enough time to search dusty libraries, shady markets and faraway forests for rare ingredients?
column3: Tout érudit respectable des arts hermétiques devrait prendre un apprenti. Les expériences alchimiques sont des opérations complexes qui nécessitent des mains supplémentaires. Que[Root.GetLLle] [Root.GetTitle] a assez de temps pour faire des recherches dans des bibliothèques poussiéreuses, des marchés véreux et des forêts lointaines pour des ingrédients rares ?
column4: Jeder respektable Gelehrte der hermetischen Künste sollte sich einen Lehrling nehmen. Alchemistische Experimente sind komplizierte Operationen, die zusätzliche Hände erfordern, und welche[Root.GetrMale] [Root.GetTitle] hat schon genug Zeit, um in staubigen Bibliotheken, auf zwielichtigen Märkten und in fernen Wäldern nach seltenen Zutaten zu suchen?
column6: Todo erudito respetable de las artes herméticas debería contar con un aprendiz. Los experimentos de alquimia son operaciones complejas que requieren mucha ayuda. ¿Qué [Root.GetTitle] tiene tiempo para buscar ingredientes peculiares entre bibliotecas polvorientas, mercados de dudosa reputación y bosques lejanos?

column2: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! must either assign an apprentice through the §YMinor Titles§! screen or keep their eyes open for a promising pupil to appear to complete this mission.
column3: [Root.Get_Le_Title]§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! doit soit assigner un apprenti par l'intermédiaire de l'écran des §YTitres mineurs§! ou garder les yeux ouverts pour qu'un élève prometteur apparaisse pour remplir cette mission.
column4: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! muss entweder über das Menü §YNiedrige Titel§! einen Lehrling zuweisen oder nach einem vielversprechenden Schüler Ausschau halten, um diese Mission abzuschließen.
column6: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! debe asignar un aprendiz mediante el menú §YTítulos menores§! o mantener los ojos abiertos para dar con un alumno prometedor y completar esta misión.

column2: Donate to the Schools of Learning
You have been asked to donate money to the Schools of Learning. A herald will arrive shortly to facilitate the transaction.
To complete this mission, wait for the herald to arrive, then pay him.
The Schools of Learning has asked you to restore an old library of theirs. You have accepted, but it will take a lot of work to get this building back to Schools of Learning standards...
To complete this mission, you must decide how the library will be restored. (Wait for the events to pop up.)

Your colleague [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has found a letter detailing the possible locations of some great antediluvian works of Science. A deal has been struck – [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] shall share the contents of the letter with you, and you shall fund the expedition.
If §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! sets out on one of the expeditions suggested by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and finds an antediluvian scientific text, the mission is completed.

The greedy and paranoid [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] guards [FromFrom.GetHerHis] secrets jealously. A most shameful behavior, indeed! Unlike [FromFrom.GetHerHim], you know how to share. In the spirit of collaboration, you and a colleague has agreed to infiltrate [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s laboratory and either steal or destroy anything of value. Perhaps you will do both!
column3: L'avide et paranoïaque [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] garde jalousement ses secrets. Un comportement vraiment honteux ! Contrairement à [FromFrom.GetLuiElle], vous savez comment partager. Dans un esprit de collaboration, vous et un collègue êtes d'accord pour infiltrer le laboratoire de [FromFrom.GetFirstName] et de voler ou détruire quelque chose de valeur. Peut-être vous ferez les deux !
column4: Gierig und paranoid, wie [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] ist, bewacht [FromFrom.GetSheHe] [FromFrom.GetHerHis]e Geheimnisse mit größter Aufmerksamkeit. Ein höchst schändliches Verhalten, fürwahr! Anders als [FromFrom.GetSheHe] wisst Ihr, wie man teilt. Im Zuge Eurer Zusammenarbeit habt Ihr und ein Kollege beschlossen, das Labor von [FromFrom.GetFirstName] zu infiltrieren und alles darin, was von Wert ist, entweder zu stehlen oder zu zerstören. Vielleicht werdet Ihr beides tun!
column6: [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] es una persona indolente y paranoica que guarda sus secretos celosamente. ¡Su actitud es absolutamente vergonzosa! Tú, por el contrario, sí sabes compartir. Fieles a vuestro espíritu de colaboración, tu colega y tú habéis acordado infiltraros en el laboratorio de [FromFrom.GetFirstName] y robar o destruir cualquier objeto de valor. ¡Quizá hagáis ambas cosas!

column2: Your colleague will bring you to the laboratory of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!. If you manage to steal or destroy anything and get away unnoticed, the mission is completed.
column3: Votre collègue vous amènera au laboratoire [FromFrom.Get_du_Title]§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!. Si vous parvenez à voler ou détruire quoi que ce soit et à partir incognito, la mission sera réussie.
column4: Euer Kollege wird Euch ins Labor von §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! bringen. Wenn Ihr es schafft, etwas zu stehlen oder zu zerstören, ohne dass man Euch bemerkt, ist die Mission abgeschlossen.
column6: Tu colega te llevará al laboratorio de §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!. Si logras robar o destruir cualquier cosa y huir sin que te descubran, completarás la misión.

column2: Has NOT already psychoanalyzed [From.GetHerselfHimself] to predict future events\n
As a member of [From.Society.GetName], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! may choose to turn to the ancient art of psychoanalysis in an attempt to foretell the future.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait in order to turn to the ancient art of psychoanalysis in an attempt to foretell the future.
As a member of [From.Society.GetName], you may use a standardized test to gain insight into the future of your child §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on portraits of your children in order to make them take a standardized test.
Has NOT already taken a standardized test\n
Schools of Learning scholars may chose an apprentice. In exchange for tutoring, the apprentice will take care of one's laboratory and assist during experiments.
column3: Les érudits hermétistes peuvent choisir un apprenti. En échange de tutorat, l'apprenti s'occupera du laboratoire et aidera pendant les expériences.
column4: Hermetische Gelehrte können einen Lehrling wählen. Im Gegenzug für die Unterrichtung wird sich der Lehrling um das Labor seines Meisters kümmern und bei Experimenten helfen.
column6: Los eruditos herméticos pueden escoger a un aprendiz. A cambio de enseñarle, el aprendiz se ocupará del laboratorio y de proporcionar su ayuda durante los experimentos.

column2: Your apprentice will accompany you on a trip to gather rare ingredients for your chemistry inventory.

One cannot fully understand our place in the cosmos if one does not see to the stars. It is said that the cosmos contains the truth of all creation, from its first moment – by solving its riddles, one could understand anything.
Does NOT already own Master Theses on all topics.\n

Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own portrait in order to write an hard-to-decipher book of your knowledge. This is an artifact with potentially powerful bonuses, which only characters with high learning can comprehend.
Do research and write an essay on a topic, before sending it out for peer review. Should it become accepted by at least 3 out of 5 peers, you will gain a reward.
Has NOT recently written an essay\n
This character is focusing on writing an essay, and is therefore unable to spend enough time actually governing.
The Dean of the Schools of Learning, possession an understanding of the world that others can only aspire to.
Enables the decision to write an essay and have it be reviewed by fellow members of the Schools of Learning. If it is accepted, you gain §Y[From.Society.GetCurrency]§!.\n

Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
We are delighted to learn that you have taken your first step towards enlightenment. The secrets of Science may be obscured to you now, but in time you may come to understand them as I have.

Hold in your mind all that you know, and [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], will instruct you.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
A truly useful Laboratory can take both time and money to assemble but without an office dedicated to chemistry I doubt I will ever be able to unveil the deeper secrets of science.

Secrecy is of great importance as the experiments I will perform in my laboratory may both frighten the simpletons and tantalize my fellow chemists. To keep intruders away laboratories are often built deep within a castle, but a more accessible building would likely be more efficient...

In order to properly heat and break down metals or other substances I require furnaces of differing temperature and flames of different types. The chemical texts speak of various setups that could be beneficial.

The glass in which I keep my concoctions is brittle and breaks easily. This may be tolerable for beakers and other dispensable glass but earlier today a giant alembic shattered into a thousand pieces after having been heated carelessly by one of my undergraduates...

Not all ceramics are suited for the kind of chemical work I do. My experiments require both the porous orange ceramics that can absorb components in the crucible and the dark and highly fire resistant pots in which even the strongest metal can be melted. Good quality does come at a high price however...
[Root.GetFullName] will keep the laboratory supplied using the ceramics from local potters to avoid the high price of imported crucibles.
[Root.GetFullName] will now only tolerate the best of imported ceramics from master potters.

It may not be the most advanced office of chemistry, in fact it might well be the opposite of that, but I have finally completed a laboratory in which to conduct my experiments. Soon the secrets of this world will reveal themselves to me!

This character has spent both time and a small fortune to construct a proper office where chemistry experiments can be performed. This laboratory is built to be able to handle any experiment currently documented and employs a small team of undergraduates to keep all the furnaces going at all times.

With no expenses spared and under the constant supervision of [Root.GetFullName] a house unlike any other has been erected to realize the dream of a perfect chemical working environment. Many of the instruments have been conceived and drawn by the [Root.GetTitle] personally and the great number of furnaces alone employs a team of undergraduates from all the entire realm.\n\nThe office now stands ready to allow [Root.GetFullName] to uncover the secrets of the world, all it requires is for its master to give the instructions.

To the simpletons, laboratory equipment can appear both frightening and alien. Word has gotten out of some of the unusual contraptions that have been built for my laboratory. A small mob of simpletons has assembled outside, demanding answers about why I am constructing so clearly ungodly things.

To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

My [Root.GetSisterBrother], I have a proposal which might interest you. An old letter detailing the possible locations of some antediluvian scientific writings came into my possession not many moons ago. If you fund an expedition, we can search for these treasures together!
For science!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
The letter mentioned three antediluvian texts: a tome in a local antiquary, a scroll hidden in a [temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship] in [temple_site.GetName], and a tablet in the ancient library ruins of [ruin_site.GetName] in [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. The further we venture, in distance as well as into the past, the greater secrets we might uncover. The choice is yours.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I have the best of news! Since our last correspondence I have acquired a map leading to a lost chamber of the great Crimson Library! While the previous options remain – a book here in [Root.Capital.GetName], a scroll in [temple_site.GetName] and tablet in [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] – I would argue that this opportunity is too great to pass up.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Excellent indeed! We shall go to Boston!
You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! set off on an expedition to Boston, hoping to find the ruins of the Crimson Library.\n

My misgivings arose early after our arrival in Boston, but [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] insisted that we must have misinterpreted the map. After every failure, [From.GetSheHe] had a new idea. A suspicion crept upon me... What if the map was forged, and [From.GetFirstName] knew? Was the blasted expedition a plot to ruin me?!

Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portrait of any §RDepressed§! or §RStressed§! character in your court, in order to make them a solution that raises their spirits, in exchange for §Y[From.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
As a [From.GetSocietyRank] of [From.Society.GetName], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can make a solution to raise low spirits.

As I stare intently at the ink blot before me, it seems to be nothing but an ugly stain. Yet it only takes a few moments before I realize that it contains a pattern... a mirror image of the world, the past and the future. I take a deep breath, to attune myself to what I am looking for...
You gaze into the intricate patterns splayed across you...\n

The ink is obscure. I stare at it, unblinking, until my eyes begin to strain. It takes time, maybe hours, as time becomes fleeting.\nThen I see it. A fierce battle! I can almost hear the clanking of swords.
It takes a minute, but after a while I am certain of it: I see a lion! Or... No, it's a woman. With the head of a lion!
I concentrate for a long time, staring into the ink. I almost have time to doubt myself, but then I see it: a curious shape, an inky shadow, then two. It looks like a fire, and a sword.
I see... ink stains. It looks like... ink.

At first, I cannot see a single shape in the ink. I shake my head. I have to use my third eye! I close my two external eyes, and when I open them again, I see it clearly.\nA bed of flowers, and an urn.

I am not sure what I was expecting, but this child blinks at me with the most curious eyes. I suddenly feel all my worries wash away. I must have misunderstood the vision I had during my psychoanalysis.

I am not sure what I was expecting, but this newborn child blinks at me with the dullest of eyes. I feel my confidence wain as I hold [From.GetHerHim] and I soon give [From.GetHerHim] back to the nurse. I must have misunderstood the vision I had in the ink.
My lover has passed away. Was this what my vision in the ink was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
My dear friend has passed. Was this what my vision in the ink was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
column3: Mon cher ami a trépassé. Était-ce là ma vision dans l'eau ? Comment le saurais-je ? Oh, pauvre de moi.
column4: Mein lieber Freund ist gestorben. War es das, was ich bei meiner Vision im Wasser gesehen habe? Wie hätte ich das wissen sollen? Oh, weh.
column6: Mi querido/a colega ha muerto. ¿Esto es de lo que trataba la visión que me reveló el agua? ¿Cómo iba a saberlo? ¡Pobre de mí!

column2: My [mnm_scrying_dead.GetFatherMother] has passed. Was this what my vision in the ink was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
My [mnm_scrying_dead.GetSonDaughter] has passed. Was this what my vision in the ink was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
Some time has passed since my pet died. Was this what my vision in the ink was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
Nothing has happened that I can attribute to my vision in the ink. I'm starting to think I didn't see anything at all.

The human mind holds many secret in its depths, but it is not indecipherable. If I make the right test with the right frame of mind, I will uncover the destiny of [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName].

After finally giving the test to my child, I have noticed that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] received a high score in mathematics and logic... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for administrative tasks and a practical mind.

After finally giving the test to my child, I have noticed that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] got above-average scores in history and geography... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for the battlefield and a combat prowess uncommon amongst most of our members at court.

After finally giving the test to my child, I have noticed that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] received a high score in social intellect... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for a position of diplomacy, with wits and charm uncommon amongst most of our members at court.

After finally giving the test to my child, I have noticed that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] received a high score in critical thinking... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for intrigue and cleverness.

After finally giving the test to my child, I have noticed that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] got high scores in reading comprehension... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for studying, and an intellect uncommon amongst most of our members at court.

My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] gave me a grueling test and recently finished evaluating it. "You'll make a fine [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] one day", [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] says. While I am not sure what [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] means, I have noticed that [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] looks at me differently lately... Perhaps with pride?

My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] gave me a greuling test. A servant told me that it is for my own good. I am not sure what [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] gets from it, but I have noticed that [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] looks at me differently lately... "What good is another [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]?" [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] sighs, and walks away.

Before [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] passed away, I'm told that [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] prepared a special test for me and forced me to complete it. I am not sure what all of this means, but I I have heard servants whispering about it. They say the results say I am destined for greatness.

Before [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] passed away, I'm told that [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] had me take a special test. Servants tell me it was about my destiny, and that my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] did not think the results were in my favor.
The test results were right after all.
In line with [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] results, you believe §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! will make great use of this talent.\n
The results say what they say.

I wipe the sweat from my brow as [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] points out the flaws in my parrying technique. I'm glad that a [inspiring_adult.GetEducationRole] like [inspiring_adult.GetHerHim] takes time out of [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] schedule to spar with me, and fighting has in some ways become part of who I am. I sometimes wonder whether my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] was right... Did the test tell me the results of my battles too?

[inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] has often inspired me to keep my eyes and ears sharp... So when I find [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] notes carelessly strewn around [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] quarters, I cannot help but wonder if [inspiring_adult.GetSheHe] intended for me to find them. "From every [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName], [Root.GetSheHe] could be the one we will remember... Will the young [Root.GetLordLady] refuse what the test has so clearly laid out for [Root.GetHerHim]?"

Reading has always come naturally to you, child, [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] tells me, leaning in over my notes. "Your writing is improving as well", [inspiring_adult.GetSheHe] adds, walking back to [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] seat by the window. The [Root.GetCapitalHolding] is unusually quiet today and outside the sun is shining. Lost in thought, my mind drifts to my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]'s standardized test.

I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] remains interested in [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Turning my eyes upwards, I pause for a moment, marveling at how accurate the test was.

I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] remains interested in [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Turning my eyes upwards, I take a deep breath. Perhaps the test showed something that can't be changed. May it be that [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]'s destiny is out of my control?

I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] is growing reluctant to the idea of becoming a [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]. Sighing, I rub my temples. Perhaps knowing about [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] talents makes [horoscope_child.GetHerHim] anxious?

I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] is growing increasingly reluctant to the idea of becoming a [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]. I take a deep breath while I contemplate the test and its supposed accuracy.
I believe the test told the truth about [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName].
Actually, I think the test gave my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] the wrong result.
You doubt the importance of the standardized test you made for §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

Over the years, I've always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Even once I officially finished my education, I did not feel satisfied. "There must be more to this", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. I am not sure if the test was truly accurate, as my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] thought it was, but I do feel like I can finally be more than what everyone has assumed.

Over the years, I've always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Even once I officially finished my education, I did not feel satisfied. "There must be more to this", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] might have had said other things, but I feel confident that the test showed me the true path forward in life.

Over the years, I haven't always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Yet I did not feel satisfied at all, once I officially finished my education. "I think I made a mistake in neglecting these studies", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. I am not sure if the test was truly accurate, as my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] believed it was, but I do feel like I can finally be more than what everyone has assumed.

Over the years, I haven't always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Yet I did not feel satisfied once I finished my education. "I think I made a mistake in neglecting these studies", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] might have had other plans for me, but perhaps [horoscope_maker.GetHerHis] test was right all along?

I brewed the solution just like the instructions dictated. Mere seconds after it passed my lips a wave of pleasurable sensations rolled over me! While the peak of my bliss was short-lived, that first rush must have washed away the dispiriting depression that has plagued me for so long.

I brewed the solution just like the instructions dictated. [From.GetTitledFirstName] gratefully accepted my help and as soon as [From.GetSheHe] drank my concoction, I could see a change in [From.GetHerHim]. Now the light has returned to [From.GetHerHis] eyes!

Every respectable scholar of the Schools of Learning should take on an apprentice. Scientific experiments are complex operations which requires extra hands, and what [Root.GetTitle] has enough time to search dusty libraries, shady markets and faraway forests for rare ingredients?

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s apprenticeship has reached its end. [From.GetSheHeCap] knows enough of chemistry, psychology and Cosmogony to be acknowledged as an Schools of Learning scholar in [From.GetHerHis] own rights. As a parting gift, I gave [From.GetHerHim] a tome containing a few of my most well-guarded secrets. I did not pretend to notice the tears in [From.GetHerHis] eyes, but they touched me deeply.

Said to be written by Carolus Saganus himself, this great work is supposed to hold the secret of the Cosmos and its transmutation. Someone who succeeds in deciphering its ancient and obscure language is one step closer to scientific understanding.

To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

My [Root.GetSisterBrother], I have a proposal which might interest you. An old letter detailing the possible locations of some antediluvian scientific writings came into my possession not many moons ago. If you fund an expedition, we can search for these treasures together!

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
The letter mentioned three antediluvian texts: a tome in a local antiquary, a scroll hidden in a [temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship] in [temple_site.GetName], and a tablet in the ancient library ruins of [ruin_site.GetName] in [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. The further we venture, in distance as well as into the past, the greater secrets we might uncover. The choice is yours.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

When we found the engraved door to the chamber, we could hardly believe our eyes. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I had nearly given up. That day would be the very last of our search, we had decided, so our discovery must surely have been a divine miracle! My hands were shaking as I, alongside the servants, cleared the last rubble and heaved the door open.\n\nLantern held high over our heads, my colleague and I entered first. The faint light fell on countless pots and chests, elaborate wall paintings and a great forge. Something else reflected the light from deep within the chamber, something incredibly ancient... [From.GetFirstName]'s breaths were quick and shallow. 'It.... it cannot be!'
Finally, the deepest secrets of Carolus Saganus shall be mine!
Do my eyes deceive me, or is that old American?
the origins of the scientific method in the era before the Schools of Learning
the Quantum's relationship to the Cosmos
how unity with the Universe is achieved
the nature of the First Particle
the nature of the Inner and the Outer mind
unity through the lens of the Unified Theory
the semiotic meaning of the Crimson Books
the truth inherent in Higher Consciousness
the interaction between the mind and chemistry
the definition of a true master thesis
the inner workings of the subconscious
whether books and scrolls are semiotically the exact same thing
how to derive atomic power from 'heavy metals' to begin with
whether it's true that I have a pristine copy of the Cosmos at home or not
how it would be incredible if one's subconscious could reveal itself openly, then return below the surface
what is more important in the Cosmic hierarchy, stars or planets
the top ten scientists of all time
that feeling of Cosmic unity you get from smelling certain liquids at the moment of synthesis
why it is that brutes and harpies are more able to get lovers than us
whether or not black swans could exist

I face the daunting task of researching and writing an entire essay, to be reviewed by my peers... To have it be accepted by the League would be a great boon to me, but if the quality is found to be lacking it might be a big blow to my prestige.
The risks and rewards may be what they are, you have neither the time nor the resources to make an extraordinary effort, and will rely on your intelligence rather than on hard work.
column3: Quels que soient les risques et les récompenses, vous n'avez ni le temps ni les ressources pour faire un effort extraordinaire, et vous comptez sur votre intelligence plutôt que sur le dur labeur.
column4: Ganz gleich, was auch auf dem Spiel stehen mag, Eure Zeit und Ressourcen erlauben keine gewaltigen Aufwand, also werdet Ihr Euch in der Hauptsache auf Eure Intelligenz verlassen müssen.
column6: Los riesgos y recompensas serán los que serán, pero no tienes ni el tiempo ni los recursos para esforzarte afanosamente, y confiarás más en tu inteligencia que en el trabajo intensivo.

column2: You will spend extra time and resources on writing the essay paper, even if this comes to the detriment of managing your realm. Surely this will produce a paper of high quality!
This character is focusing on writing a comprehensive essay, and is therefore unable to spend enough time actually governing.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on ekpyrotic cosmogony! It explores the potential cyclical nature of Creation itself, which might provide a new approach to Cosmogony. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Big Bang! It explores the mechanics behind the great event, and new perspectives by which one might uncover this, which in turn might provide a new approach to Cosmogony. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Laws of the Cosmos! It explores the Cosmic Order that permeates this world, and might provide a new insight into Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on semiotic interpretation! It explores the hidden meaning in these ancient texts, which might in turn provide a new insight into Cosmogony. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on distillation! It explores new methods of the process, which might enable the creation of a variety of exciting new chemical solutions. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on fermentation! It explores new approaches to the process, which might enable the creation of a variety of exciting new chemical solutions. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the elusive Cure for the Common Cold! It explores the concept, both in a practical and semiotic sense, and it delves into potential methods of creating it. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on Atomic Transmutation! It explores the concept, and its potential for transmuting seawater into infinite energy, as well as how to create it. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on fundamental semiotics! It explores psychology, in particular the way the Mind connects certain concepts, and how they are interpreted. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the subconscious! It explores psychology, in particular the unconscious operation of the Mind and what truths it can reveal. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Superego! It explores psychology, and in particular the nature and importance of this aspect of the Mind. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Id! It explores psychology, and in particular the nature and importance of this aspect of the Mind. Now all that is left is to submit it to my scientific peers, for review.

A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on ekpyrotic cosmogony, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?

This character has successfully published an essay.
Choose to focus on one of the three specialties within §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!. Doing so will allow you to choose a lifestyle trait.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait in order choose one of the three different specialties within the Schools of Learning, allowing you to decide on your lifestyle.
Is allowed to choose a Specialty at this time\n

I have been in the Schools of Learning for some time and yet, I have not been able to contemplate enough on all of the three specialties. If I were to focus on one of them I might further increase my understanding of it. But which specialty should I choose?
Psychology and the study of the Mind.
Chemistry and the interaction of particles.
I changed my mind. Perhaps another time.
This art will lead to the §YScholar§! trait.
column6: Esta arte te guiará hacia el rasgo §YErudito§!.

column2: This art will lead to the §YMystic§! trait
column6: Esta arte te guiará hacia el rasgo §YMístico§!.

column2: This art will lead to the §YTheologian§! trait
column6: Esta arte te guiará hacia el rasgo §YTeólogo§!.

column2: As a scholar, I have dedicated much time to the art of studying the inner depths of the human Mind. I learned a great deal in doing so. But I should spend more time with the other specialties as well. Which one should I focus on more closely?

To study chemistry and how to transform both particles and the noosphere is indeed a learning experience. Albeit more difficult than one might imagine. But time has come to also master the other specialties. Which one should be my focus?

I have attained great knowledge in the art of Cosmogony. Learning about the Cosmos and the laws of nature. Yet, to master the truth and understand it, I will need to learn more about the other specialties. Which one should I study next?
I shall learn more about psychology.
The art of Cosmogony is important.
I will keep my current specialty for now.
Does NOT have an active higher quality Master Thesis on the same topic.\n
Our work shall be a great tribute to Science!

The invention, the culmination of our great collaboration, is finally finished! Our accomplishment is twofold – not only have we rediscovered the recipe for an efficient explosive powder, we have also designed and produced a device that can harness it like the firearms of old. This 'handgun' is sure to revolutionize warfare once again!

The invention, the culmination of our great collaboration, is finally finished! We have invented a device which always points towards the lodestar of the north, making it possible to navigate even when the celestial bodies are obscured by clouds. It will surely give an advantage to our traders, and be worthy of standing alongside ancient examples.
Donate to the Schools of Learning
You have been asked to donate money to the Schools of Learning. A herald will arrive shortly to facilitate the transaction.
To complete this mission, wait for the herald to arrive, then pay him.
The Schools of Learning has asked you to restore an old library of theirs. You have accepted, but it will take a lot of work to get this building back to Schools of Learning standards...
To complete this mission, successfully rebuild the library.
Has a §YLiege§!, §YVassal§!, or a §Yneighboring ruler§! who follows the §YAmericanist§! faith or a heresy\n

The Mountain Guardians train hard and maintain an expert physique, not only for the purpose of battle, but for games of sport – participating is prestigious, and the most skillful of their community are adored by everyone, commoner and noble alike.
column3: Les Gardiens de la Montagne s'entraînent dur et garde un rust_cultist physique, non seulement pour les batailles, mais aussi pour les jeux sportifs. Y participer est prestigieux, et les plus talentueux de leur communauté sont adorés par quiconque, les roturiers tout comme les nobles.
column4: Die Bergwächter trainieren hart und pflegen einen ausgezeichneten Körperbau, nicht nur für den Kampf, sondern auch für sportliche Spiele. Die Teilnahme an jenen ist prestigeträchtig und die Talentiertesten werden von Bürgerlichen und dem Adel gleichermaßen verehrt.
column6: Los Guardianes de la montaña entrenan duramente y mantienen un físico experto no solo para el combate, sino para los deportes — participar da prestigio y el mejor de su comunidad es adorado por todos, nobles y plebeyos por igual.

column2: This band of warriors has existed since time immemorial — legend has it that their first leader was the warrior-king MacArthur. Before the Event, this society could only be joined by direct descendants of the legendary heroes who fought the enemies of the sea, but now, any worthy Americanist may join its ranks.

softly humming the tune I just finished singing, before clearing [fellow_member.GetHerHis] throat. "It's just something I made up, while we were marching" I say, dismissively. "You should keep it up, friend!", the [fellow_member.GetManWoman] argues. "It's good for morale, for the troops, you know".
column3: fredonnant doucement l'air que je venais de finir de chanter. « C'est juste quelque chose que j'ai inventé alors que nous marchions », dis-je, dédaigneusement. « Vous devriez continuer ! C'est rust_cultist pour le moral, pour les troupes, vous savez », soutient-[fellow_member.GetIlElle].
column4: summt leiste die Melodie, die ich gerade fertig gesunden habe, bevor [fellow_member.GetSheHe] [fellow_member.GetHerHis]en Kehle befeuchtete. "Es ist etwas, dass ich erfunden habe, während wir marschierte", sagte ich abweisend. "Ihr solltet es fortführen, Freund!, sagte [fellow_member.Getderdie] [fellow_member.GetManWoman]. "Es ist gut für die Moral der Truppen, wisst Ihr?".
column6: tarareando suavemente el tema que acabo de cantar, justo antes de que se acalare la gartanta. "Es solo una tema que me inventé mientras marchábamos, dándole poca importancia. "¡Debes guardarla, amig[Root.GetOA]!", arguye, "Es buena para la moral y las tropas..."

column2: The Black Tantra Cult focuses on exploring things that are normally considered taboo to Hindus in an effort to achieve greater spiritual understanding. Many allege that this group actually partakes in depraved and hedonistic ceremonies with the intent of summoning dark forces to do their bidding, but this is surely an exaggeration...
Recruit to the Black Tantra Cult
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a member of the Black Tantra Cult.
Has not been approached by the Black Tantra Cult.

The Monks of the Hindu Sanghas aim to be an integrative and supporting force in society. Monks can seek to achieve spiritual enlightenment through meditation and scriptural studies or through charity and participating in the local economy. The Sanghas are honored and often patronized by Hindu rulers.

The Monks of the [hindu.GetName] Mathas aim to be an integrative and supporting force in society. Monks can seek to achieve spiritual enlightenment through meditation and scriptural studies or through charity and participating in the local economy. The Mathas are honored and often patronized rulers.
column3: Les moines des matha [hindu.GetName]s visent à être une force d'intégration et de soutien dans la société. Les moines peuvent chercher à atteindre l'illumination spirituelle par la méditation et l'étude des textes sacrés, ou par la charité et la participation à l'économie locale. Les matha sont respectés et fréquemment patronnés par les dirigeants.
column4: Die Mönche der [hindu.GetName]en Matha versuchen in der Gesellschaft eine integrative, fördernde Kraft zu sein. Die Mönche streben nach spiritueller Erleuchtung durch Meditation und das Studium der Schriften oder durch karitative Handlungen als Teil des Wirtschaftskreislaufs. Die Mathas sind oft hoch angesehen.
column6: Los monjes de los mathas [hindu.GetName]s pretenden ser una fuerza integradora y de apoyo en la sociedad. Los monjes pueden tratar de alcanzar la iluminación espiritual mediante la meditación y los estudios de las escrituras, o por medio de la caridad y participando en la economía local. Los mathas son honrados y a menudos favorecidos por los gobernantes.
